fields.label: Key
fields.name: qm_email_key
fields.instructions: Enter only lowercase and underscores such as "student_completion".

fields.label: Trigger
fields.name: qm_email_trigger
fields.instructions: Choose the action that will trigger the email to be sent. Actions fire at key points during the use of QuizMaster such as completion of a quiz.

fields.label: Recipients
fields.name: qm_email_recipients
fields.instructions:
Enter recipient email(s) separated by a comma: email1@example.com, email2@example.com. 

Available shortcodes: [quiztaker_email]

fields.label: Migration Type
fields.name: qmmg_migration_type
fields.instructions: Choose the type of migration. If the source of your export is WP Pro Quiz choose the WP Pro Quiz Export option. For migration from one QuizMaster site to another choose QuizMaster export.

fields.label: Data Source
fields.name: qmmg_migration_source
fields.instructions: Choose the source of your quiz migration data. Choose Upload File to be able to Upload File, or choose Paste XML to directly enter XML markup into a textarea.

fields.label: Free Choice Answers
fields.name: qmqe_free_choice_answers
fields.instructions: Correct answers (one per line) (answers will be converted to lower case).

fields.label: Fill in the Blank Answer
fields.name: qmqe_cloze_answers
fields.instructions:
Enclose the searched words with { } e.g. "I {play} soccer". Capital and small letters will be ignored.
You can specify multiple options for a search word. Enclose the word with [ ] e.g. "I {[play][love][hate]} soccer" . In this case answers play, love OR hate are correct.
If mode "Different points for every answer" is activated, you can assign points with |POINTS. Otherwise 1 point will be awarded for every answer.
e.g. "I {play} soccer, with a {ball|3}" - "play" gives 1 point and "ball" 3 points.

fields.label: Message for correct answer
fields.name: qmqe_correct_msg
fields.instructions: This text will be visible if answered correctly. It can be used as explanation for complex questions. The message "Right" or "Wrong" is always displayed automatically.

fields.label: Message for incorrect answer
fields.name: qmqe_incorrect_msg
fields.instructions: This text will be visible if answered incorrectly. It can be used as explanation for complex questions. The message "Right" or "Wrong" is always displayed automatically.

fields.label: Show points earned in the results messages?
fields.name: qmqe_show_points_in_box

fields.label: Time Limit
fields.name: qmqu_time_limit
fields.instructions: Enter 0 for no time limit.

fields.label: Show only specific number of questions
fields.name: qmqu_show_max_question
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, maximum number of displayed questions will be X from X questions. (The output of questions is random)

fields.label: Question overview
fields.name: qmqu_show_review_question
fields.instructions: Add at the top of the quiz a question overview, which allows easy navigation. Additional questions can be marked "to review". Additional quiz overview will be displayed, before quiz is finished.

fields.label: Autostart
fields.name: qmqu_autostart
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, the quiz will start automatically after the page is loaded.

fields.label: Score IP Lock
fields.name: qmqu_statistics_ip_lock
fields.instructions: Protect the score system from spam. Score for a quiz taken by user will only be saved every X minutes from same IP. (0 = deactivated)

fields.label: Score Category
fields.name: qmqu_score_category
fields.instructions: Choose a category for scoring purposes. Only 1 category can be chosen for scoring purposes. Use the default category meta box on the right side of the quiz editor to assign categories for display purposes. See the help guide for further details on the difference between "score" and "display" categorization.

fields.label: Number answers
fields.name: qmqu_numbered_answer
fields.instructions: If this option is activated, all answers are numbered (only single and multiple choice)

fields.label: Hide correct and incorrect messages
fields.name: qmqu_hide_answer_message_box
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, the correct or incorrect message will be displayed.

fields.label: Correct and incorrect answer mark
fields.name: qmqu_disabled_answer_mark
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, answers won't be color highlighted as correct or incorrect.

fields.label: Force user to answer each question
fields.name: qmqu_forcing_question_solve
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, the user is forced to answer each question. If the option "Question overview" is activated, this notification will appear after end of the quiz, otherwise after each question.

fields.label: Hide question position overview
fields.name: qmqu_hide_question_position_overview
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, the question position overview is hidden.

fields.label: Hide question numbering
fields.name: qmqu_hide_question_numbering
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, the question numbering is hidden.

fields.label: Display category
fields.name: qmqu_show_category
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, category will be displayed in the question.

fields.label: Show category score
fields.name: qmqu_show_category_score
fields.message: If you enable this option, the results of each category is displayed on the results page.

fields.label: Only registered users are allowed to start the quiz
fields.name: qmqu_start_only_registered_user
fields.instructions: If you enable this option, only registered users allowed start the quiz.

fields.label: Execute quiz only once
fields.name: qmqu_quiz_run_once
fields.instructions: If you activate this option, the user can complete the quiz only once. Afterwards the quiz is blocked for this user.

fields.label: Activate Logging
fields.name: qm_log_activate
fields.instructions: Turn on logging reports.
